About Me

    Hi, I'm Anshul Rai!
    Currently, I'm working as a freelancer and building software solutions to complex problems for a large organization. This experience has led me to find inspiration in living life outside of a routine and constantly strive to progress beyond my current abilities.
    I did my undergrad at the National Institute of Technology - Trichy, graduating with a B.Tech degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering. The time spent here gave birth to my love for all things code, something I lacked prior to joining.
    I'm an avid reader and am always looking for book recommendations, irrespective of the genre! My background as a student-athlete in college has cultivated in me a deep love for trying out all sports, but I particularly enjoy playing football and basketball.
